category.name: 4GD
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MDL_effectivity_shown_columns
preference.preference_description: Specifies if unit, date or all columns are shown in the Effectivity view of the application. Valid Values: DateOnly - The date effectivity columns are shown in the Effectivity view. UnitOnly - The unit number effectivity columns are shown in the Effectivity view. All - The date effectivity and unit number effectivity columns are both shown in the Effectivity view.
